column4: hello what if it says it's gonna be 2 days to fetch upgrades, at 19 0f 1167 right now can I continue if I turn the pc off?
yes. it'll just resume when you boot up again.
:)  I went though that myself a number of times--I do not have 24/7 internet..I get online at wifi hotspots at the library...and have to interrupt downloads when the library closes. :)
and you won't have to restart from the beginning either. any files that completed download will be perserved.
